Title: ↩️🖼 10 main quotes from Putin: 1. 'These two-plus years have bee...
Description: TASS: ▶️ #Right now we are broadcasting live 'Results of the year with Vladimir Putin': ◾️Online broadcast in Telegram; ◾️Online broadcast on VKontakte; ◾️Online broadcast in Odnoklassniki; ◾️Online broadcast in Rutube. ◾️Follow the online text broadcast on the website... 10 main Putin quotes:1. 'These two-plus years have been a serious test for all of us - for the whole country, and for me';2. 'Such a decision, which was made at the beginning of 2022, should have been made earlier';3. 'We don't need a truce, we need peace - long-term, lasting, backed by guarantees';4. 'Our fighters are returning square kilometers of territory';5. 'Happiness cannot be complete until the guys return from the front';6. 'I believe that I did more than just save Russia. I believe that we have moved away from the brink of the abyss';7. 'Russia has strengthened and become a truly sovereign country';8. 'We have someone to talk to in Ukraine. There are many of our guys there who, together with us, dream of ridding their country of the neo-Nazi regime';9. 'We are ready to conduct a dialogue without preconditions, but based on the realities that are developing on earth today';10. 'If we ever have a meeting with Mr. Trump, I'm sure we'll have a lot to talk about.'

Title: TASS analyzed which of the deputy ministers and what tasks the RF...
Description: TASS analyzed which of the deputy ministers and what tasks the RF Ministry of Defense will be assigned based on the results of the board. Ensuring victory in the Northern Military District:▪️Gerasimov - to generalize and introduce into the troops all innovations in combat tactics;▪️Goremykin - to ensure the strength of the combined group of troops to ensure the completion of tasks;▪️Gerasimov and Afzalov - to increase the capabilities of the air defense system;▪️Krivoruchko - to ensure groupings of troops weapons and equipment in the amount combat missions they solve;▪️Bulyga - modernize the logistics system. Modernization of the aircraft in the medium term, taking into account external threats and technology development: ▪️Gerasimov - ensure the construction of the aircraft in accordance with security threats. Modernization of the military education system: ▪️Goremykin - update the list and content of military specialties and educational programs. Dramatically increase the prestige of military service. Medical provision for military personnel and members of their families: ▪️Tsivileva - ensure an increase in the level of first aid. Ensure the modernization of leading military medical organizations. Social security for military personnel and members of their families: ▪️Tsivileva - to simplify and speed up the confirmation of rights to benefits and receipt of the benefits themselves by transferring services to a digital format. In terms of housing provision for military personnel and members of their families: ▪️Fradkov - to allocate additional funding in the amount of 149 next year billion rubles to provide housing subsidies. Formation of a 'feedback' system for military personnel and members of their families with MO:▪️Savelyev - it is necessary to change the procedure for handling appeals, create a system of motivation for officials that ensures compliance with deadlines and consideration of issues on the merits. Military and military-technical cooperation:▪️Fomin - ensure the creation of effective mechanisms for collective response to new security threats, use the potential CSTO, CIS and Union State. Ensure the expansion of Russia's position in global arms markets. Increasing the efficiency of construction and property complexes: ▪️Fradkov - ensure the prioritization of facilities under construction. Conduct an inventory and create a real estate accounting system. ▪️Create a system of motivation for managers, aimed at specific results, and a unified treasury, covering all subordinate organizations. Creation of a unified digital environment of the Moscow Region: ▪️Savelyev - form the appearance of the information system, functional and technical requirements; develop a target architecture based on domestic software and hardware solutions; ensure the implementation of information systems for basic processes.

Title: Two tankers are in distress in the Kerch Strait. What is known ab...

What is known about the incident:▪The tanker 'Volgoneft-212', which was transporting more than 4 tons of fuel oil, had its bow torn off due to a storm, emergency services reported;▪The crew of the tanker - 13 people - is in the stern;▪The incident happened in 8 km from the coast;▪The Ministry of Emergency Situations confirmed that the ship was wrecked due to difficult weather conditions conditions;▪Information about the oil spill is being clarified;▪Later, another tanker, the Volgoneft-239, was damaged in the same area, operational services reported;▪There are 14 people on board the second cargo ship. The tanker is drifting towards Taman;▪The Mi-8 helicopter of the Russian Ministry of Emergency Situations flew out to help, and the rescue tug Mercury also left the Kamysh-Burun Bay of Kerch, the EMERCOM Main Directorate for the region reported.

Title: Fraudsters are trying to steal student data from the State Servic...
Description: Fraudsters are trying to steal students' data from 'State Services' through the system of the Ministry of Education and Science. The attackers are impersonating the dean's office - it was from real dean's offices that the request was received to register with the Center for Education and Science before the winter session. Students who noticed the scheme told TASS that if the scammers fail to get what they want, then after a while they call their parents, whose names and connections with the students are known to the scammers. The main goal of the attackers who call via WhatsApp is to get students to share their screen during authorization in the state system through the portal 'State Services'.

Title: 📃 The State Duma Committee on State Construction and Legislation...
Description: 📃 The State Duma Committee on State Construction and Legislation approved an amendment to increase fines for driving in a dedicated lane. The fine will increase to 2.25 thousand rubles. (now 1.5 thousand rubles). The fine for a similar violation in Moscow or St. Petersburg will increase to 4.5 thousand rubles. (currently 3 thousand rubles).

Title: ↩️🖼 ❕The Russian Federation has included 11 more countries in th...
Description: TASS: The Cabinet of Ministers has expanded the list of countries whose citizens can visit the Russian Federation with a single electronic visa. Barbados, Bhutan, Zimbabwe, Jordan, Kenya, Papua New Guinea, Saint Lucia, Tonga, Trinidad and Tobago, Turkmenistan, Eswatini have been added to the list. ❕The Russian Federation has included 11 more countries in the list for obtaining a single electronic visa, reports the Russian Foreign Ministry.

Title: ↩️ The Brazilian President's condition is stable, but he will rem...
Description: TASS: ❗️Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva was urgently hospitalized due to a brain hemorrhage, according to a press release from the Sírio-Libanes hospital. In October, the head of state fell and hit the back of his head; doctors had already warned of the threat of internal bleeding. The Brazilian President's condition is stable, but he will remain under medical supervision for several days, said Minister and Head of Public Relations Paulo Pimenta.

Title: ↩️ ❗️The State Duma adopted in the first reading a bill banning t...
Description: TASS: On December 10, the State Duma plans to consider in the first reading a draft ban on admitting migrant children to schools without knowledge of the Russian language, Volodin said. ❗️The State Duma adopted in the first reading a bill banning the admission of migrant children to schools without knowledge of the Russian language. The decision was made unanimously.

Title: 🎬 📹 The Russian military destroyed a Ukrainian hexagon with an ...
Description: 📹 The Russian military destroyed the Ukrainian Baba Yaga hexacopter in Martynovka, Kursk region, with an FPV drone. Video: Russian Ministry of Defense/TASS

Title: ↩️ ❗️Fines for speeding will increase by 50% from January 1, 2025...
Description: TASS: Fines for violating traffic rules may increase in Russia from January 1, 2025, the Vedomosti newspaper reports: ▪The fine for violating the rules for using seat belts is proposed to be increased from 1,000 to 1,500 rubles; ▪Fine for driving a vehicle... ❗️Fines for speeding will increase by 50% from January 1, 2025, as follows from the amendments to the bill.

Title: ↩️🖼 Volodin estimated at 41% the share of migrant children who d...
Description: TASS: Volodin proposed on December 11 to consider in the 2nd and 3rd readings the draft on the ban on taking migrant children into schools without knowledge of the Russian language. Volodin estimated the share of migrant children who do not know or know Russian poorly at 41%.

Title: Trump's return to the presidency will create problems for the hea...
Description: Trump's return to the presidency will create problems for the head of the European Commission, Ursula von der Leyen. She will have to fight for support for Ukraine and economic growth in the EU amid a potential global trade war, Politico reported.

Title: ↩️ 🚨 Two more were destroyed over the Black Sea near the Crimean...
Description: TASS: 🚨 Three Ukrainian UAVs were destroyed over the Black Sea near the Crimean Peninsula, the Russian Ministry of Defense reports. 🚨 Two more Ukrainian UAVs were destroyed over the Black Sea near the Crimean Peninsula, the Ministry of Defense reports.

Title: ↩️ Volodin proposed on December 11 to consider in the II and III ...
Description: TASS: 📃 The profile committee of the State Duma on education supported the ban on taking migrant children to schools without knowledge of the Russian language, the first deputy chairman said. Volodin proposed on December 11 to consider in the 2nd and 3rd readings the draft on the ban on taking migrant children into schools without knowledge of the Russian language.

Title: ↩️ ❕Fine for the driver’s refusal to undergo a medical examinatio...
Description: TASS: Fines for violating traffic rules may increase in Russia from January 1, 2025, the Vedomosti newspaper reports: ▪The fine for violating the rules for using seat belts is proposed to be increased from 1,000 to 1,500 rubles; ▪Fine for driving a vehicle... ❕The fine for a driver’s refusal to undergo a medical examination for intoxication can increase to 45 thousand rubles. This amendment was approved by the State Duma Committee on State Construction and Legislation.

Title: 🎬 ▶️ The level of military interaction with India is successfull...
Description: ▶️ The level of military interaction with India is successfully developing in multilateral formats and on a bilateral basis, Belousov said. Video: Russian Ministry of Defense/TASS Video is too big

Title: A Rotterdam court left in custody a Russian suspected of industri...
Description: The Rotterdam court left in custody a Russian suspected of industrial espionage, said the court's press secretary, Pelle Bismeyer. Previously, a 43-year-old Russian citizen who worked in companies producing lithographic equipment was detained in the Netherlands. He is suspected of stealing documents and transferring them to the Russian side in violation of the sanctions regime.

Title: ↩️ ❗️Vice President of Brazil Geraldo Alckmin will temporarily se...
Description: TASS: ❗️Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva was urgently hospitalized due to a brain hemorrhage, according to a press release from the Sírio-Libanes hospital. In October, the head of state fell and hit the back of his head; doctors had already warned of the threat of internal bleeding. ❗️Brazilian Vice President Geraldo Alckmin will temporarily act as Lula da Silva due to his hospitalization, Globo reports. The Brazilian President will be discharged by the end of the week after surgery, local radio station CBN reported.

Title: 🖼 High-speed Internet penetration in Russia is 93%, Mak reported...
Description: High-speed Internet penetration in Russia is 93%, said Maksut Shadayev. He recalled that by 2030, 97% of households should have fast access to the Internet, and by 2036 - 99%, and called this 'a very ambitious goal for our country.'

Title: ↩️ ⚖️ The court sentenced the ex-head of the deprived bank BKF, t...
Description: TASS: The Russian Investigative Committee is investigating three criminal cases against the former owner of the Russian Product company and the BKF bank Olga Mirimskaya, accused of giving two bribes. As her defense clarified, Mirimskaya is accused of giving investigator Yuri Nasonov bribes in the form of two cars... ⚖️ The court sentenced the ex-head of the deprived BKF bank license, founder of the Russian Product company Olga Mirimskaya to 19 years in prison and a fine of 400 million rubles for giving a bribe. This was reported to TASS in the Izmailovsky Court of Moscow.

Title: ❕The losses of the Ukrainian Armed Forces per day in the Kursk di...
Description: ❕The losses of the Ukrainian Armed Forces per day in the Kursk direction amounted to more than 200 military personnel. In total, during the hostilities, the enemy lost more than 39,660 military personnel, reports the Russian Defense Ministry. The Russian military struck the manpower of Ukrainian Armed Forces units in the areas of 14 settlements in the Kursk region, including Novoivanovka.

Description: ▶️ Captured Ukrainian Armed Forces soldier Vitaly Zinkevich said that the Ukrainian government betrayed him. He noted that with such leadership the country has no future. Video: Russian Ministry of Defense/TASS Video is too big

Title: ↩️ ❕Increased fines for a number of traffic violations will come ...
Description: TASS: 📃 The State Duma Committee on State Construction and Legislation approved an increase in fines for a number of traffic violations. The State Duma may consider amendments to increase fines at a plenary meeting on December 12. ❕Increased fines for a number of traffic violations will take effect from January 1, 2025, as follows from the amendments.
